name: live-sass
description: Compile Sass or Scss to CSS at realtime.

savePath.description:
Set the save location of exported CSS.
 Set the relative path from Workspace Root.
 '/' stands for your workspace root. 
 Example: /subfolder1/subfolder2. (NOTE: if folder does not exist, folder will be created as well).
savePath.patternErrorMessage:
Must start with any of:
`/` or `\` (for workspace root)
`~/` or `~\` for relative to the file being processed. Must not end with a path separator (`/` or `\`)

savePathReplacementPairs.description: A set of key value pairs. When a key is found in the save path it is replaced with the value. (Note: this step happens after savePath has been applied)

linefeed.description: Choose the linefeed terminator to use in the CSS output
linefeed.markdownDeprecationMessage: **BEWARE**: This setting will be removed in [sass v2.0](https://github.com/sass/dart-sass/issues/1585)
linefeed.deprecationMessage: BEWARE: This setting will be removed in sass v2.0

indentType.description: Choose the indent type to use in the CSS ouput (for `expanded` formats only)
indentType.markdownDeprecationMessage: **BEWARE**: This setting will be removed in [sass v2.0](https://github.com/sass/dart-sass/issues/1585)
indentType.deprecationMessage: BEWARE: This setting will be removed in sass v2.0

indentWidth.description: Choose the indent width to use in the CSS ouput (for `expanded` formats only)
indentWidth.markdownDeprecationMessage: **BEWARE**: This setting will be removed in [sass v2.0](https://github.com/sass/dart-sass/issues/1585)
indentWidth.deprecationMessage: BEWARE: This setting will be removed in sass v2.0

liveSassCompile.settings.formats.description: Set your exported CSS Styles, Formats & save location.

liveSassCompile.settings.excludeList.description:
All Sass/Scss files inside the folders will be excluded. 

Examples: 
'/**/node_modules/**',
'/.vscode/**', 
'/.history/**' 

Glob Patterns are accepted.

items.patternErrorMessage: Must start with a path separator (`/` or `\`)

liveSassCompile.settings.includeItems.description:
This setting is useful when you only deal with a few sass files. Only these Sass files will be included.
NOTE: There is no need to include partial sass files.

items.patternErrorMessage: Must start with a path separator (`/` or `\`) and end with a `.sass` or `.scss`

liveSassCompile.settings.partialsList.description: Specific glob patterns to identify partial files/folders

items.patternErrorMessage: Must start with a path separator (`/` or `\`)

liveSassCompile.settings.generateMap.description:
Set to `false` if you don't want a `.map` file for each compiled CSS.
Default is `true`

liveSassCompile.settings.useNewCompiler.description: Set to `true` to use new SASS's new `compile` function. It's more performant!

liveSassCompile.settings.autoprefix.description: Automatically add vendor prefixes to unsupported CSS properties (e. g. transform -> -ms-transform). Specify what browsers to target with an array of strings (uses [Browserslist](https://github.com/ai/browserslist)). Pass `false` to turn off.

liveSassCompile.settings.watchOnLaunch.description:
Set this to `true` if you want Live Sass Compiler to automatically start watching your .sass or .scss file when you open an applicable workspace
Default is `false`

liveSassCompile.settings.compileOnWatch.description: Set this to `false` if you don't want all Sass files to be compiled when Live Sass Compiler starts watching.

liveSassCompile.settings.showOutputWindo.description:
Set the level of logging that is recorded and shown to you.
Default is `Information`
Backwards compatible setting for those migrating from the original extension

liveSassCompile.settings.forceBaseDirect.patternErrorMessage: Must start with a path separator (`/` or `\`) and must not end with one
liveSassCompile.settings.forceBaseDirect.description: Defines a subdirectory to search from (no directory outside of this will be search)

liveSassCompile.settings.rootIsWorkspace.description: A leading slash is relative to the workspace, not the drive (e.g C://)

liveSassCompile.settings.showAnnouncemen.description: Show the announcement whenever a new version is installed

announcement.message: SassCompiler v6.0.6: now with YouTube video! Changes: dependancy bumps + doc changes
